block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Who knew Elephants could fly too. This is Paper Plane 35 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It's the Elephant Plane designed by Ashley Wood. Dumbo, anyone? Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 034 : Spectre by Andrew Dewar", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/wYLFKA2WIyQ Elephant Plane by Ashley Wood Tutorial Timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:18 Flight Test 0:45 Start Folding 1:28 Diamond Base 1:50 Bird Base 2:16 Folding the Trunk of the elephant plane 3:15 Folding the Wing Tip of the Airplane 3:43 Folding the Wings of the Airplane 4:19 Opening the Wings 4:27 Flying the Plane Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
